member.name: T:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer
member.summary: An Umbraco Lucene.Net indexer which will index the text content of a file

member.name: F:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.TextContentFieldName
member.summary: Gets the name of the Lucene.Net field which the content is inserted into
member.value: The name of the text content field.

member.name: M:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.#ctor(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,UmbracoExamine.DataServices.IDataService,Lucene.Net.Analysis.Analyzer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor to allow for creating an indexer at runtime

member.summary: Constructor to allow for creating an indexer at runtime

member.name: M:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Set up all properties for the indexer based on configuration information specified. This will ensure that all of the folders required by the indexer are created and exist.

member.name: M:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.ExtractTextFromFile(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Provides the means to extract the text to be indexed from the file specified

member.name: M:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.GetDataToIndex(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String)
member.summary: Collects all of the data that needs to be indexed as defined in the index set.
member.param: Type of index (should only ever be media)
member.returns: Fields containing the data for the index

member.name: M:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.ExceptChars(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.Char},System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.Char})
member.summary: remove all toExclude chars from string

member.name: P:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets the supported extensions for files, currently the system will only process PDF files.

member.name: P:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.UmbracoFileProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the umbraco property alias (defaults to umbracoFile)

member.name: T:UmbracoExamine.PDF.PDFIndexer.PDFParser
member.summary: Parses a PDF file and extracts the text from it.

member.summary: Stores the unsupported range of character
